data.title: New Aboutus Section
data.text: Newtopia inspires healthy habit change through personalized one-on-one coaching. You'll learn to eat healthier, stay active, lower your stress, and lose weight to become your best self.
data.text1: You will be personality matched with a Newtopia Inspirator (health coach). We provide you with personalized recommendations tailored to fit your personality, lifestyle and genetic profile. You'll also receive a free Fitbit [for clients that offer], smart scale and mobile app to track your goals, nutrition, activity, and weight progress all in one place.
data.title: This isn't your traditional weight loss program. It's so much more!
